```{r}
state <- c(1, 0, 0, 6.28, 0)
planet <- new("Planet")

# class(planet)
planet@GM == 12.56637
# 12.56637
planet@state
# 0 0 0 0 0
planet <- init(planet, state)
planet@GM
# class(planet)
# "Planet"
planet@state
# 1.00 0.00 0.00 6.28 0.00
cat("-------------------------------\n")
res <- setStepSize(planet@odeSolver, 0.001)
getStepSize(res)  == 0.001# res is of class Euler
# [1] 0.001
cat("+++++++++++++++++++++++\n")
planet <- init(planet, state)
getState(planet)
# [1] 1.00 0.00 0.00 6.28 0.00

for (i in 1:5) {
    planet <- doStep(planet)
    # doStep(planet)
    cat("s[5]: ", planet@state[5], "\n")
}
```

```{r}
source("./R/ode_generics.R")

ode <- new("ODE")
euler <- new("Euler", ode)
class(euler)

# euler@stepSize <- step(euler)
getStepSize(euler)
# 0.1
euler <- setStepSize(euler, 0.1234)
getStepSize(euler)
# [1] 0.1234

init(euler, stepSize = 1.234)    # specify param if many generics with same name
step(euler)

euler@ode@state <- c(1, 0, 0, 6.28, 0)
getState(euler@ode)
# [1] 1.00 0.00 0.00 6.28 0.00

euler@ode@state <- getState(euler@ode) 
euler@ode@state
# [1] 1.00 0.00 0.00 6.28 0.00

step(euler)

# euler@stepSize <- step(euler)
# euler@numEqn
# 

# more tests. this time assigning the state vector
ode <- new("ODE")
ode@state <- c(1, 0, 0, 6.28, 0)
euler <- new("Euler", ode)
euler <- init(euler, 0.0123)
euler@numEqn
# 5
getStepSize(euler)
# [1] 0.0123
```

```{r}
# this is a virtual class
source("./R/ODESolver.R")

ode <- new("ODE")

odesolver <- new("ODESolver", ode)
getStepSize(odesolver)
# 0.1
# Error in new("ODESolver") : 
 # trying to generate an object from a virtual class ("ODESolver")
st <- step(odesolver)
# odesolver <- setStepSize(odesolver, 1.125)
odesolver <- setStepSize(odesolver, 0.001)
getStepSize(odesolver)

odesolver <- init(odesolver, 2.345)
getStepSize(odesolver)
# 2.345

# assign a vector to variable ode in odesolver
odesolver@ode@state <- c(1, 0, 0, 6.28, 0)
odesolver@ode@state
# [1] 1.00 0.00 0.00 6.28 0.00

getState(odesolver@ode)
# [1] 1.00 0.00 0.00 6.28 0.00


# more tests. this time assigning the state vector
ode <- new("ODE")
ode@state <- c(1, 0, 0, 6.28, 0)
odesolver <- new("ODESolver", ode)
odesolver <- init(odesolver, 0.0123)
odesolver@numEqn
# 5
getStepSize(odesolver)
# [1] 0.0123
```

```{r}
ode <- new("ODE")
abstract <- new("AbstractODESolver", ode)
abstract@numEqn <- 1

# call functions in ODE
getState(abstract@ode)   # using a slot in AbstractODESolver
getRate(ode)             # using the ode object declared with ODE
                         # We shouldn't do this. Use rather the slot 
getRate(abstract@ode)    # this is the correct way

init(abstract@ode, 4)
step(abstract)
abstract <- setStepSize(abstract, 3)

getStepSize(abstract)

slot(abstract, "numEqn")
```

```{r}
setClass("testComplex", slots = c(zz = "complex"))

## method for whole group "Complex"
setMethod("Complex", "testComplex",
          function(z) c("groupMethod", callGeneric(z@zz)))

## exception for Arg() :
setMethod("Arg", "testComplex",
          function(z) c("ArgMethod", Arg(z@zz)))

z1 <- 1+2i
z2 <- new("testComplex", zz = z1)
z2
```

```{r}
## some class definitions with simple inheritance
setClass("B0", slots = c(b0 = "numeric"))
setClass("B1", slots = c(b1 = "character"), contains = "B0")
setClass("B2", slots = c(b2 = "logical"), contains = "B1")

## and a rather silly function to illustrate callNextMethod
f <- function(x) class(x)

setMethod("f", "B0", function(x) c(x@b0^2, callNextMethod()))
setMethod("f", "B1", function(x) c(paste(x@b1,":"), callNextMethod()))
setMethod("f", "B2", function(x) c(x@b2, callNextMethod()))

b1 <- new("B1", b0 = 2, b1 = "Testing")
b1

b2 <- new("B2", b2 = FALSE, b1 = "More testing", b0 = 10)
b2
```

```{r}
# PlanetApp
source("./R/Planet.R")

testPlanet <- function() {
    planet@odeSolver@stepSize
    planet@state
}

setup <- function() {
    setStepSize(planet@odeSolver, 0.01)
    
    planet <- init(planet, state)
}

run <- function() {
    for (i in 1:5) {
        planet <- doStep(planet)
        cat(planet@state[5], "\n")
    }
}

state <- c(1, 0, 0, 6.28, 0)
planet <- new("Planet")

setup()
testPlanet()
```
